title: 260 pw-Studio in Broadhurst Gardens, Finchley Road, Ref: 264
body:
QR Code Link to This Post


Broadhurst Gardens, Finchley Road, NW6
£260.00 Per Week
Ref: 264

Property Details
We are happy to offer this beautiful and bright mezzanine studio apartment in Broadhurst Gardens, West Hampstead, NW6

The property consists of:
* Beautifully presented and spacious accommodation throughout
* Large and bright mezzanine level double Studio apartment with a fully fitted kitchen Including washing machine, ensuite shower room, small hallway, and wood flooring throughout.
* Gas bills, electricity bills and water bills all included.
* Broadhurst Gardens is a pleasant residential area close to the shops, bars and restaurants of Belsize Park, Hampstead and West Hampstead.
* Walking distance from the shops and facilities of Swiss Cottage and Finchley road. Finchley Road Underground Station (Jubilee and Metropolitan lines) is close by for links throughout London.

Available Now
